mapper.select: SELECT group_id, owner_id, numbers, name, description, icon, create_time, modify_time FROM ld_relation_group WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO ld_relation_group (group_id, owner_id, name, description, icon, modify_time) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{ownerId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{icon}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM ld_relation_group WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND owner_id = #{ownerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE IGNORE ld_relation_group SET name = #{name}, modify_time = now() WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
UPDATE IGNORE ld_relation_group SET description = #{description}, modify_time = now() WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
UPDATE IGNORE ld_relation_group SET icon = #{icon}, modify_time = now() WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
UPDATE IGNORE ld_relation_group SET numbers = numbers + 1, modify_time = now() WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
